docs.snippet: The mayor of Berkeley, Missouri, says the city will thoroughly investigate the fatal shooting of a black 18-year-old by a white police officer. But Mayor Theodore Hoskins says comparisons to the Michael Brown case in Ferguson are unfair....

headline.main: Berkeley Mayor Says Shooting Different to Ferguson
headline.print_headline: Berkeley Mayor Says Shooting Different to Ferguson

docs.lead_paragraph: The mayor of Berkeley, Missouri, says the city will thoroughly investigate the fatal shooting of a black 18-year-old by a white police officer. But Mayor Theodore Hoskins says comparisons to the Michael Brown case in Ferguson are unfair.

docs.snippet: As falling oil prices have ripped through energy stocks this year, five U.S. corporate spin-offs in the sector have not escaped the share price carnage and face a tougher road to recovery than more-established companies....

headline.main: Oil Spin-Off Stocks Could Face Longer Road to Recovery
headline.print_headline: Oil Spin-Off Stocks Could Face Longer Road to Recovery

docs.lead_paragraph: As falling oil prices have ripped through energy stocks this year, five U.S. corporate spin-offs in the sector have not escaped the share price carnage and face a tougher road to recovery than more-established companies.

docs.snippet: "The Interview," the provocative comedy that triggered a  devastating cyberattack on Sony Pictures, went straight to U.S. consumers on Wednesday in an unprecedented online debut after hacker threats prevented its wide release on Christmas day....

headline.main: Sony Puts 'The Interview' on YouTube, Other Digital Platforms
headline.print_headline: Sony Puts 'The Interview' on YouTube, Other Digital Platforms

docs.lead_paragraph: "The Interview," the provocative comedy that triggered a  devastating cyberattack on Sony Pictures, went straight to U.S. consumers on Wednesday in an unprecedented online debut after hacker threats prevented its wide release on Christmas day.

docs.snippet: For longer than anyone has recorded history, water has bubbled from out of the ground at a natural spring in what used to be deep woods about an hour's drive down a two-lane road south of Columbia....

docs.snippet: To say Ava DuVernay's "Selma" feels relevant is a mammoth understatement. It's altogether animated, propelled and enlivened by its contemporary urgency. "Selma" is a history lesson that throbs with today....

headline.main: Review: 'Selma' a History Lesson That Throbs With Today
headline.print_headline: Review: 'Selma' a History Lesson That Throbs With Today

docs.lead_paragraph: To say Ava DuVernay's "Selma" feels relevant is a mammoth understatement. It's altogether animated, propelled and enlivened by its contemporary urgency. "Selma" is a history lesson that throbs with today.

docs.snippet: Russian President Vladimir Putin ordered his government on Wednesday to rein in rising vodka prices, as he battles to preserve his popularity amid an aggravating economic crisis....

headline.main: Putin Orders Vodka Price Cap as Russia's Economic Crisis Escalates
headline.print_headline: Putin Orders Vodka Price Cap as Russia's Economic Crisis Escalates

docs.lead_paragraph: Russian President Vladimir Putin ordered his government on Wednesday to rein in rising vodka prices, as he battles to preserve his popularity amid an aggravating economic crisis.
